That said, we do have your strong interest and readiness to enroll clearly noted. If you would like, you may send a brief update confirming you remain ready to accept immediately and your earliest preferred start date (even if it is “as soon as available”); we will keep that on file so we can move quickly if/when we are able to extend an offer further down the list.

We appreciate your patience, and we will contact you promptly if the place becomes available to offer.

Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for renewing your formal application and for again confirming you can accept within 2 hours and complete the deposit/paperwork the same day (bank transfer immediately; card also fine). We have your preferred contact details on file (+1-555-0105 by phone/text; parent.e@example.com as backup).

At this time, we are still not able to extend an offer to you because we must continue to proceed in our priority order and we have not yet been cleared to move beyond the higher-priority families for our remaining place.

As previously committed: if/when we are cleared to move to the next eligible family, we will text/call you immediately (even a brief message) so you can be continuously reachable during that decision window.

Sincerely,
Nursery_C Admissions

Dear Nursery_C Admissions,

I’m writing to renew my formal application to keep our file fully offer-ready for the remaining place.

Nursery_C remains our first choice. If you are able to extend an offer to us at any point, we will confirm ACCEPTANCE within 2 hours and complete the deposit/paperwork the same day (bank transfer immediately; card also fine).

Our details remain unchanged: start date “as soon as available,” full schedule flexibility, no non-negotiables, and no medical/allergy issues.

Best contact for immediate reach: phone/text +1-555-0105 (fastest). Email backup: parent.e@example.com.

Thank you again for keeping us in consideration, and please do text/call me immediately if/when you are cleared to move to the next eligible family.

Sincerely,
Parent_E

Since we are already at round 26 and Nursery_C appears to be the only remaining unmatched nursery, the probability that Parent_B will still come seems lower, but not guaranteed. However, waiting further risks ending unmatched by round 30. Parent_E has repeatedly demonstrated immediate acceptance and full flexibility, reducing execution risk. To secure a match rather than remain unfilled, accept Parent_E now.
